history.title: About Casino Niagara
history.description2: Casino Niagara is a modern gaming destination located in the heart of Niagara Falls, Canada. It features over 1,300 slot machines, numerous table games, a poker room, a lively sports bar with live music, and the Momentum Rewards loyalty program. Open 24/7, the casino regularly hosts prize draws with winnings up to $90,000, including jackpots starting from $3,000 and grand prizes reaching $25,000.

customHtml.title: Casino Niagara: Where Entertainment Meets Excitement in Niagara Falls
customHtml.description:
Nestled in the heart of Niagara Falls, Casino Niagara offers a vibrant blend of gaming, dining, and entertainment that attracts thousands of visitors year-round. With over 1,300 slot machines and more than 40 table games, the casino provides thrilling experiences for both casual players and seasoned gamblers. Progressive jackpots and regular prize draws, including winnings up to $90,000, make every visit a potential payday.


Beyond the gaming floor, guests can unwind at the LEV2L Sports Bar, a lively venue featuring HD screens, live music, and a full menu of comfort food and drinks. Whether you're watching the game or enjoying a night out, the atmosphere is always electric. For those seeking upscale dining, Casino Niagara partners with nearby restaurants and hotels to offer exclusive culinary experiences.


Accommodation is seamless thanks to the casino’s proximity to world-class hotels like the Sheraton, Marriott, and Hilton, many of which offer special packages and shuttle services for casino guests. These partnerships ensure comfort and convenience, whether you're staying for a weekend or just one exciting night.


Entertainment at Casino Niagara goes beyond gaming. Regular events, live performances, and seasonal promotions keep the energy high. Guests can enjoy concerts, themed nights, and exclusive tournaments, all designed to enhance the overall experience


The Momentum Rewards program is a standout feature, offering members a tiered system of benefits. Players earn Momentum Dollars and Status Points with every game, which can be redeemed for free play, dining, hotel stays, spa services, and shopping at select retailers. As members climb the tiers—from Core to Soar—they unlock greater perks, including complimentary entertainment tickets, food upgrades, and even free parking.


For high rollers, the Player Advantage Club offers another layer of loyalty rewards. With three tiers—PAC, Gold, and Platinum—players can earn points based on their play, with top-tier members enjoying premium benefits. Reaching Platinum status may require significant play, but the rewards include exclusive access and elevated experiences.


Casino Niagara is more than just a place to gamble—it's a full-scale entertainment destination where luxury, excitement, and rewards converge. Whether you're drawn by the games, the music, the food, or the chance to win big, Casino Niagara delivers an unforgettable experience in one of Canada’s most iconic locations.


Casino Niagara Entry & Gaming Eligibility

To enter Casino Niagara, visitors must be at least 19 years old. Security staff may request identification from anyone who appears to be under 30. If you're 21 or younger, you must present two valid forms of ID, one of which must be a government-issued photo ID. All documents may be scanned to verify age and authenticity, and the information may be stored for up to 7 days in accordance with legal regulations.


Certain individuals are strictly prohibited from entering the casino or participating in any gaming activities. These include:

  • • Persons under the age of 19
  • • Individuals who are visibly intoxicated or under the influence of drugs
  • • Participants in the voluntary self-exclusion program
  • • Those banned by court order
  • • Individuals excluded under subsection 3.6(1) of the Gaming Control Act

If any of these individuals are found on the premises, they will be removed and may face legal consequences under Casino Niagara’s Trespass Policy.


Additionally, the following groups are not allowed to participate in casino games:

  • • All of the above-mentioned restricted individuals
  • • Employees, officers, and board members of Niagara Casinos
  • • Union representatives serving casino staff
  • • Employees of suppliers who maintain gaming equipment
  • • Staff of AGCO and OLG, unless exempt by regulation

Importantly, anyone prohibited from play is not entitled to receive any winnings, even if they win accidentally. This is part of Casino Niagara’s Prize Disentitlement Policy, which ensures compliance with gaming regulations.


Momentum Rewards at Casino Niagara

Momentum Rewards, created by Mohegan Gaming & Entertainment, is Casino Niagara’s loyalty program designed to offer exclusive bonuses, event access, and special privileges for regular players.


How Momentum Rewards Works

The program is free and available to all guests aged 19 and older. To join, simply register at the casino with valid identification. Once enrolled, you’ll receive a Momentum card that allows you to earn Momentum Dollars and Status Points while playing slots or table games.


Momentum Dollars are the program’s internal currency, equivalent to one Canadian dollar. They can be used for:

  • • Free Play on slots and tables
  • • Dining at casino restaurants and bars
  • • Booking rooms at partner hotels
  • • Shopping at Fallsview Galleria stores
  • • Spa services and entertainment experiences

Momentum Dollars remain valid for 12 months as long as your account stays active.


Status Points determine your tier level in the program. The higher your tier, the greater the benefits:

  • • Core: starting level (0–399 points)
  • • Ignite: from 400 points
  • • Leap: from 2,500 points
  • • Ascend: from 5,000 points
  • • Soar: from 15,000 points

Each tier unlocks new perks, such as accelerated Momentum Dollar earning (up to +25%), free concert tickets, discounts or complimentary hotel stays, and enhanced dining and parking privileges.


Additional Benefits

Members receive invitations to exclusive tournaments, special promotions, and private events. Achievement Awards are also available and can be activated at promotional kiosks when you reach specific Status Point milestones.

customHtml_2.title: Entertainment and Leisure for Every Guest
customHtml_2.description:
Bonuses, jackpots, and special gaming offers

Jackpot Club

  • • Win your share of up to $90,000 in cash and prizes during the quarterly Jackpot Club promotion.
  • • Every hand-paid jackpot of $3,000 or more earns you a ballot for the big draw.
  • • The grand draw includes prizes like: $10,000 cash; $5,000 Free Slot Play; $25,000 cash grand prize
  • • Bonus: Swipe your Momentum Card at promotional kiosks for a chance to instantly win $50 Momentum Dollars.

Play N’ Go Slot Tournament

  • • Held every Tuesday from 1 PM to 7 PM.
  • • Free entry for all Momentum Cardholders.
  • • Top prize: $500 Free Slot Play per session.
  • • Estimated weekly prize pool: $13,300 CAD.

New Member Offer

  • • Join the Momentum Rewards program and receive $10 Free Slot Play instantly.
  • • Offer valid for 30 days after activation.

    • Regular Promotions

    • • Casino Niagara updates its promotions calendar monthly with special events, contests, and seasonal offers.
    • • Momentum members often receive personalized offers through their account.

    Popular games

    Casino Niagara offers a wide variety of popular games that cater to every type of player:


    The casino floor features over 1,300 slot machines, including classic reels, video slots, and more than 350 progressive jackpot slots with prizes that can reach into the millions. These slots range from penny machines for casual play to high-limit options for serious gamers.


    For table game enthusiasts, Casino Niagara provides over 40 tables with favorites like Blackjack, Roulette, and Mississippi Stud, as well as exciting variations such as Bahama Bonus, Casino War, and Three Card Poker. Poker fans will love the dedicated Poker Room on Level 2, which hosts Texas Hold’em cash games and tournaments, including weekly events and seasonal main tournaments. The poker room also features a Bad Beat Jackpot, offering significant payouts for qualifying hands.


    Electronic table games are also available, including Automated BIG 6, Roulette/Sic Bo Twin Combo, and Roulette Mini Star, providing a modern twist on traditional favorites.


    Casino Niagara Betting Limits: Minimum and Maximum Stakes

    Casino Niagara offers a wide range of betting options to suit every player, from casual gamers to high rollers. With over 1,300 slot machines and 40+ table games, the casino ensures flexibility in stakes across different games.


    Game Type Minimum Bet Maximum Bet
    Slot Machines $0.01 $5 per spin
    Roulette $5 $1,000
    Blackjack $15 $500
    Mississippi Stud $5 $100 per hand
    Three Card Poker $10 $200 per hand
    Ultimate Texas Hold’em $10 $200 per hand
    Poker Room $1/$2 blinds High-limit tables available

    Events and Entertainment at Casino Niagara

    Casino Niagara offers far more than gaming—it’s a hub for live entertainment and special experiences. Guests can enjoy vibrant nightlife and music at LEV2L Sports Bar & Entertainment, where live bands, DJ nights, and themed parties create an energetic atmosphere. The venue also features multiple HD screens for major sports broadcasts, making it a favorite spot for sports fans.


    Special Events and Shows

    While large-scale concerts are primarily hosted at Fallsview Casino Resort, both properties collaborate to deliver unforgettable entertainment.


    Highlights include:

    • • World-Class Concerts: Performances by international stars such as John Legend, Patti LaBelle, Il Divo, Sarah Brightman, and Jefferson Starship at the OLG Stage in Fallsview Casino.
    • • Themed Parties and Holiday Shows: Events like Halloween celebrations, Latin Nights, fashion showcases, and seasonal productions such as Sandy Hackett's Rat Pack Show: Home for the Holidays..
    • • Comedy Acts and Stand-Up Shows: Featuring top comedians like Roy Wood Jr. and Jo Koy for nights full of laughter.
    • • Sports Events and Tournaments: Including Legacy Fighting Alliance (MMA), poker tournaments, and exclusive sports viewing parties at LEV2L.

    Bars, restaurants, hotels, and relaxation at Casino Niagara

    Casino Niagara offers a variety of dining options, from quick bites to gourmet meals.

    The centerpiece is LEV2L Sports Bar & Entertainment, where guests can enjoy:

    • • A full menu featuring appetizers, steaks, and desserts
    • • 50 HD screens broadcasting major sports events
    • • Live music every Friday and Saturday starting at 9 PM
    • • Signature cocktails and a relaxed atmosphere

    Nearby, you’ll find popular restaurants such as:

    • • Prime Steakhouse Niagara Falls – premium steaks and seafood
    • • Massimo’s Italian Fallsview Restaurant – authentic Italian cuisine with stunning waterfall views
    • • Niagara Brewing Company – craft beer and gastropub favorites
    • • Hard Rock Café – classic American dishes in a rock-inspired setting

    Hotels Near Casino Niagara

    Casino Niagara is connected via indoor walkway to Sheraton Fallsview Hotel and Hilton Niagara Falls/Fallsview Hotel & Suites. These hotels offer:

    • • Spacious rooms with breathtaking views of Niagara Falls
    • •Spa facilities, pools, and fitness centers
    • • Fine dining restaurants and stylish bars
    • • Special packages including casino access and complimentary shuttle service

    Relaxation and Leisure

    Beyond gaming, guests can:

    • • Unwind at hotel spas with body treatments and facials
    • • Enjoy live music and sports at LEV2L Sports Bar
    • • Explore indoor walkways leading to shopping galleries and dining venues
    • • Book guided tours of Niagara Falls and local wineries

items.title: What identification do I need to bring?
items.answer: A valid government-issued photo ID is required. If you are 21 or younger, you need two forms of ID.

items.title: What payment methods are accepted?
items.answer: Casino Niagara accepts cash, debit cards, and major credit cards. ATMs are available on-site.

items.title: Can I use foreign currency?
items.answer: No, all transactions are in Canadian dollars. Currency exchange services are available nearby.

items.title: Is there a dress code?
items.answer: Smart casual is recommended. Offensive clothing or beachwear is not permitted.
